abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: All damage done by attacks to Forretress is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shell Rupture
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Spin
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
